name: City Escape (juzek)
description:
All is lost! Escape the city before you are too.

Type commands to control your mech, but be warned. Scrambler rays will randomly swap keys and re-wire your kkeyboard making your mech difficult to control.

Created for the Mech Jam III

Thanks to ChubbyWorm for voice acting

sound track was from Monolith provided by Garo.

Everything else was me: Juzek (Doug T)
